fields.name: Azzurri Helmet White White
fields.description: Azzurri elite performance, comfort fit, super lightweight “HXM” Hurling Helmet. Polypropylene Outer Shell with air vents. Moulded Impact Liner with HXM memory foam, HXM forms to individual players heads, with natural air channels, for perfect comfort and fit. HXM, is a quick dry, anti-microbial, face material. HXM is a removable and washable liner. Faceguard is ergonomically designed with unrestricted visibility. Exchangeable chin protector and adjustable strap closure. YKK studs & rivets. Weight 585gms ± 10gms. IS355 Certified, GAA approved, Guaranteed Irish. Sizes S to XL

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Faded style - 2 Color
fields.description:
Our Faded Helmet range is one of our most popular designs.

The helmets are available in a wide variety of colors.

You can also add your name or club name to the back of the helmet.

fields.name: Atak Helmet Green
fields.description:
DESCRIPTION
High-Density PE Shell.
A high-density PE shell that has functionally designed 3 panel geometry with multiple ridges for an increased surface area to displace and deflect impacts. There are also strategically placed air vents for improved air circulation.

Lightweight.
One of the most lightweight helmets on the market while at the same time preserving the elite level of protection that it provides. Everything from the thickness of the shell and foam lining to the metal and fabric used for the adjustment clips have been modified and laboured over to deliver the most lightweight and efficient hurling helmet ever made.

Dual-density foam line.
Through a process called “Dampening” our specially formulated Dual-Density foam inner lining efficiently disrupts and disperses the energy from the force of an impact by decreasing the amplitude of the shock wave that has managed to penetrate the high density PE outer shell.

Maximum Faceguard vision.
The ATAK faceguard offers the maximum field of vision possible while still remaining within the IS355 safety regulations.

Supreme Comfort.
Soft latex foam padding and chin piece provides a comfort fit that holds the helmet to the head and neutralises all movement of the helmet around the head. This reduces friction and ensures that the field of vision of the faceguard remains the same.

fields.name: Cooper Helmet Black
fields.description:
Coolmax Interior Padding
Comfort fit foam liner
Reinforced faceguard with branded chin piece and closure straps
Size adjuster studs
Cooper branded carry bag

fields.name: Curran Hurls - Ash
fields.description:
With over 35 years in manufacturing and supplying the finest hurling equipment to players, clubs and organisations across the globe Curran Hurling have continually innovated to bring the best gear to support the greatest field games in the world.
Based in Balreagh, Monilea, Co.Westmeath, Peter Curran has a long history in the game having played club and county hurling for nearly 20 years started manufacturing hurleys using the best quality materials and techniques. His goal was to take his love and knowledge of the game and produce a range of hurling equipment that was designed to suit players of all ages and abilities.
 
Manufacturing Hurleys
In the years that followed years Peter has grown the business to supply clubs across the world while winning many enterprise awards for business and innovation along the way.
Hurling Equipment Suppliers
Noted as the inventor of the indoor hurley, Peter changed the accessibility of game forever with the specially designed equipment which gave the game the ability of proper indoor play for the first time. The game became immensly popular and spread to countries across the world
further developing the interest in Hurling as a brilliant team sport for all ages.
With a production facility that uses the best of traditional techniques with cutting edge technology Curran Hurling can cater for orders from individuals to clubs, corporate and organisations if required. We use only 100% Irish Ash from strictly managed forestry around the country.
We can manage orders from one single hurley to a fully complete set of equipment for clubs or organisations. All of our products are available online and can be purchased securely via credit or debit card. If you have a question of any kind in relation to an order, delivery or business query please feel free to contact us anytime. We would love to hear from you.

fields.name: Farrell Hurls
fields.description:
Trinity Gaels G.A.A. Club has served the Gaelic Games needs of the Holy Trinity parish since its formation in 1975. The early years were characterised with huge underage success most notably National Feile success and Minor football & hurling championship finals.  Adult success soon followed with Junior and Intermediate football and hurling league and championship wins with the result that we competed at Senior level across both hurling and football for many years.

Equally, we have enjoyed camogie success culminating in many county championship and league titles. Our ladies football section has expanded in recent years and has teams across all ages from juvenile through to adult.

In 2003, we moved to our new grounds in Drumnigh, which offers us an amazing facility with 2 adult and training pitches, hurling wall and dressing room facilities.

The club has produced many players down through the generations that have gone on  to represent Dublin on the national stage. Most famous of these is Vinny Murphy who won an All Star in 1992 and went on to win All Ireland in 1995 with the Dublin footballers.

Like any GAA club, Trinity Gaels ambition is to give our players the very best opportunity to enjoy our games. All our volunteers, coaches and helpers provide a platform to learn the skills and discipline of our games. The comradeship, friendships and community spirit engendered by everyone involved has ensured a healthy community for all to grow and live in.

fields.name: Moran Hurls - Adult
fields.description: The Moran Style Bás is a Favourite of many Club & Intercounty player. With its finely detailed finish, Handmade from Top Quality Ash, the Moran Hurl gives players that extra edge required for them to perform at their best. We encourage players to make an appointment and call to our workshop so we can tailor the Hurl to their specific weights, handle shape ,balance & any other requirements to ensure total satisfaction.

fields.name: Maher Handmade Hurl - Adult
fields.description: Maher Handmade Hurls, a family business, was originally founded in 1983, although the Maher’s had been making hurls for years before that. The quality of Paul’s work is a direct result of exposure at an early age from his father who also handcrafted hurls. This is more than just a job for Paul; it’s a way of life. For Paul, looking after the needs of each individual is important and this is reflected in his many long standing loyal customers.

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Faded Style - 3 Color
fields.description:
Our Faded Helmet range is one of our most popular designs.

The helmets are available in a wide variety of colours.

You can also add your name or club name to the back of the helmet.

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Pin Stripe
fields.description:
A customized helmet worn by Inter County players such as Wexford’s Cathal Dunbar and Cork’s Orla Cronin.

Available in a wide variety of colours.

If you wish to select a colour that is not available, please email: thomas@mycrosport.com and we will do our best to help you.

All of our helmets are certified by NSAI standards.

All helmets can be customized, this can take up to two weeks during busy periods.

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Plain
fields.description: The lightest and safest helmet on the market. The Mycro helmet conforms to NSAI I.S.355 safety standards. Lightweight and built strong and compact. It is worn by inter county players throughout the country.

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Two Tone
fields.description: A Two Tone Mycro Helmet that is available in a wide variety of colours.

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Splash - 1 Colour
fields.description:
A customised helmet that is extremely popular.

Available in a wide variety of colours.

fields.name: Mycro Helmet Splash - 2 Colours
fields.description:
A customised helmet that is extremely popular.

Available in a wide variety of colours.

fields.name: Atak Helmet White
fields.description:
DESCRIPTION
High-Density PE Shell.
A high-density PE shell that has functionally designed 3 panel geometry with multiple ridges for an increased surface area to displace and deflect impacts. There are also strategically placed air vents for improved air circulation.

Lightweight.
One of the most lightweight helmets on the market while at the same time preserving the elite level of protection that it provides. Everything from the thickness of the shell and foam lining to the metal and fabric used for the adjustment clips have been modified and laboured over to deliver the most lightweight and efficient hurling helmet ever made.

Dual-density foam line.
Through a process called “Dampening” our specially formulated Dual-Density foam inner lining efficiently disrupts and disperses the energy from the force of an impact by decreasing the amplitude of the shock wave that has managed to penetrate the high density PE outer shell.

Maximum Faceguard vision.
The ATAK faceguard offers the maximum field of vision possible while still remaining within the IS355 safety regulations.

Supreme Comfort.
Soft latex foam padding and chin piece provides a comfort fit that holds the helmet to the head and neutralises all movement of the helmet around the head. This reduces friction and ensures that the field of vision of the faceguard remains the same.

fields.description: The original and still the best. The Curran Indoor hurl was the first in the market and our design has continually improved to provide the best performance, durability and real feel of an outdoor hurley for use indoors.

fields.name: Farrell Hurls - Brian Walsh
fields.description: Farrell Hurls made by Brian Walsh

fields.name: Maher Handmade Hurl - Kids
fields.description:
Maher Handmade Hurls, a family business, was originally founded in 1983, although the Maher’s had been making hurls for years before that. The quality of Paul’s work is a direct result of exposure at an early age from his father who also handcrafted hurls. This is more than just a job for Paul; it’s a way of life. For Paul, looking after the needs of each individual is important and this is reflected in his many long standing loyal customers.

https://www.maherhandmadehurls.com/
